alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 20 at 4:19PM PDT until August 21 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Wind gusts to 70 mph possible near Mt. Charleston. * WHERE...Northeast Clark County, Western Clark and Southern Nye County, Sheep Range, Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon and Las Vegas Valley. * WHEN...Through 5 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will be relatvely brief as the remains of decaying Hilary lift through the western Mojave Desert. Several hours of strong winds in the evening are likely with gusts of 50 to 60 mph in the valley and to 70 mph near Mt Charleston.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other lightweight fixtures and unsecured outdoor objects. Operators of motorcycles, vans, campers, trailers, and other high profile vehicles should be especially cautious for the possibility of sudden, strong crosswinds and be prepared for areas of blowing dust which could drastically reduce visibility.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
